# cookie

# 设置cookie

  function setCookie(name, value, path, domain, exp) {
    var now = new Date();
    now.setTime(now.getTime() + exp * 1000);
    var expiryString = exp ? "; expires=" + now.toGMTString() : "";
    var pathString = (path == null) ? " ;path=/" : " ;path = " + path;
    var domainString = (domain == null) ? " ;domain = " + gloDomain : " ;domain = " + domain;
    document.cookie = name + "=" + escape(value) + expiryString + pathString + domainString;
  }

使用它

setCookie('test', 'testgood', '', '', 6000)

# 获取cookie

  function getCookie(cname) {
    var name = cname + "=";
    var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
    for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
      var c = ca[i];
      while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1);
      if (c.indexOf(name) != -1) return c.substring(name.length, c.length);
    }
    return "";
  }

使用它

getCookie('test')
